scripts.install-gp-chatbot: if [ -d 'node_modules/react-simple-chatbot' ]; then rm -R node_modules/react-simple-chatbot; fi && cp -R local_modules/react-simple-chatbot node_modules/react-simple-chatbot
scripts.install-google-charts: if [ -d 'node_modules/react-google-charts' ]; then rm -R node_modules/react-google-charts; fi && cp -R local_modules/react-google-charts node_modules/react-google-charts
